verses.roman:
prabhura mukhe vaiṣṇavatā śuniyā sabāra
bhaṭṭera icchā haila tāṅ-sabāre dekhibāra

synonyms: prabhura mukhe—from the mouth of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vaiṣṇavatā—the standard of Vaiṣṇavism; śuniyā sabāra—hearing of all the devotees; bhaṭṭera—of Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; icchā—desire; haila—was; tāṅ-sabāre—all of them; dekhibāra—to see.
translation: When Vallabha Bhaṭṭa heard from the mouth of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu about the pure Vaiṣṇavism of all these devotees, he immediately desired to see them.
